_sText:
-Hi! We present to  you our map "cs_office-revenge" for the game "Counter Strike: Source"
This map has been made from scratch by me and helped by my mentor
--------------------------------------------------------
Story:The action takes place in the closed area of ??an oil company.Terrorists have attacked the company as vengeance, because it has poisoned the living area of this people  during oil extraction.While attacking they have killed most of the company's administration, taking the rest as hostages.
The special forces have blocked the entrance gate with an armoured car, and they are ready  for rescuing the hostages

Counter-Terrorists: Have to take the hostages to the resucue zone, wich is by the armoured car

Terrorists: Have to protect the 4 hostages wich are in 2 differnt rooms: 2 hostages are in the director's room and the other 2 are in the roof exit.

Credits:
Valentine Bunduche - basic level design, additional rooms, basic lights
Dmitry Ghervas - mentor, final map detailing, 3D sky, editing bot navigation, optimization
